value.title: Microsoft launches Open AI Energy Initiative in partnership with Shell, C3 AI, others
value.excerpt: Microsoft has launched the Open AI Energy Initiative in collaboration with Shell, C3 AI, and Baker Hughes. It aims to offer AI-based scalable and interoperable solutions for the energy sector.

value.title: Health tech company uses Azure and AI to create priority list for COVID vaccination shots
value.excerpt: Jvion's CORE platform uses AI and healthcare data from 30 million people to determine who should be vaccinated first.

value.title: Still talking to Cortana? Microsoft gives you more control over how your voice recordings are used
value.excerpt: Microsoft still wants to re-use your voice clips, but will now ask for permission first. Users of Microsoft's voice-enabled services such as Cortana will now be able to decide whether or not the audio recordings of their interactions can be used by the company to improve its speech recognition algorithms.

value.title: Powered by Microsoft Azure and developed by CoRover, IRCTC’s AI chatbot AskDISHA enhances user experience
value.excerpt: Powered by Microsoft Azure, Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation’s (IRCTC) AI-powered chatbot AskDISHA has helped improve satisfaction of customer interactions by 70%.

value.title: AI Weekly: Meet the people trying to replicate and open-source OpenAI’s GPT-3
value.excerpt: A grassroots group of researchers is attempting to create an open source language model as powerful as OpenAI's GPT-3.
